name: PR_EST_COVERAGES
description: Multiple response general information about the price estimate. Currently stores multiple coverages applicable on dental estimate.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: Coverage references for multiple coverages on estimate when available. This item is multiple response, and used only for Wisdom and advance bill estimates.
